SELECT rl.* FROM resource_library rl
AND rl.user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%'))
AND rl.user_id IN ( SELECT u.id FROM users u JOIN user_groups ug ON u.group_id = ug.id WHERE ug.group_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{groupName}, '%') )
AND rl.created_at BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
ORDER BY rl.created_at DESC
